{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Technicolor |model=CGM4140 |revision=COM
XB6-T (Comcast) |series=AC9600 |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=distribution via ISP |fcc_date=06/14/2017 |fcc_id=G95CGM414X |type=wireless router, cable modem |pwr_v=100-130 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_ac_hz=60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3390Z;BCM3390ZKFSBG, TA1636 P20, 625764-08 P3A W; |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT10GA;Quantenna, QT10GA-ES, AC11D2D0, E06487, 1707; |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDIN8DE4-16G |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q128FVFG |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-093:P |ram1_num=2 |ram2=256 |ram2_brand=Micron |ram2_model=MT41K64M16TW-107:J |ram2_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT10GA;Quantenna, QT10GA-ES, AC11D2D0, E06487, 1707; |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT7810C;AB11F1D0, E06142-ES, 7810C-1701; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=8 |wi1_rxchains=8 |wi1_sstreams=8 |wi2_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi2_chip1_model=QT10GA;Quantenna, QT10GA-ES, AC11D2D0, E06487, 1707; |wi2_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi2_chip2_model=QT6210B |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4252;Q, 4252, QPK2;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4558;4558, BECK;8; ,,, Mighty Gecko Mesh Networking Wireless SoCs for Zigbee and Thread;Silicon Labs;EFR32MG;EFR32, MG1B232GG, 1645C00CC5;1; ,,, Blue Gecko Bluetooth Low Energy SoC;Silicon Labs;EFR32BG;EFR32, BG1B232GG, 1650C00D8S;1; ,,, MoCA PA/LNA;Broadcom;BCM3451;3451, KMLG 10, TS1634 A, 620580 1W;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.1, Bluetooth 5.0 LE, MU-MIMO, VHT160, DFS (master), MoCA 2.0, VoIP, ZigBee, Thread, |stock_os=Linux;3.14.28; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=XFSETUP-XXXX |oui= |oui_eth= }} This device is also known as the '''XB6-T''' for ''Comcast Xfinity'' *32x8 channel bonding - enables extreme cable Internet speeds *OFDM 2x2 - enables Gigabit Internet speeds :Compatible with ''Xfinity'' from {{Approved by service|Comcast}}{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }} The SanDisk flash part number looks more like SDIN8D'''G'''4-16G but :I can't find any reference to that part. DFS support was added in a Class II Product Change request on 11/28/2017. :{{WiFiCert|WFA73469|10/16/2017}} ===Press releases=== *[http://www.multichannel.com/news/cable-operators/comcast-taps-arris-technicolor-xb6-gateways-sources/409944 ''Comcast Taps Arris, Technicolor for XB6 Gateways'' on '''Multichannel News'''] :[[Technicolor]] made model to use [[Broadcom]] chipset :[[Arris]] version powered by [[Intel Puma]] silicon ===See also=== :;[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] • [[Arris]] • [[Technicolor]] *[[Arris TG3442]] - [[Intel Puma]] 7 *[[Arris TG3452]] - [[Intel Puma]] 7 *[[Arris TG3462]] - [[Intel Puma]] 7 *[[Arris TG3482ER]] - [[Intel Puma]] 7 *[[Technicolor CGA4131]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM3390 *[[Technicolor CGA4233]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM3390 *[[Technicolor CGM4140COM]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM3390 *[[Technicolor CGM4231]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM3390 *[[Technicolor CGM4331COM]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM3390 *[[Technicolor TC4400]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM3390 __NOTOC__
